cause.description:
Leukemia and Lymphoma are two of the most common cancers among us today and are becoming increasingly more common. By donating to this cause you will be helping the many families who are experiencing these sicknesses and also those families who could possibly experience it in the future. Your donation could possibly end the risk of cancers all together by enabling research.
1. More money needs to be used for researching cancers.
2. Help stop leukemia and Lymphoma.
cause.mission: Raise money for those going through Lymphoma or Leukemia and their families. Also to raise money towards researching.
cause.name: Lymphoma & Leukemia Society
